item.title: Gaussian Process Regression for Analysis of the Inbound Commuting to the Netherlands
item.description: Analyzing the gender breakdown of inbound commuters from Belgium and Germany to the Netherlands

item.title: Online Social Support and Psychological Well-Being
item.description: Examining the impact of social support on psychological well-being, with stress level as a mediator.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Hakim, a data science master’s student at Utrecht University with a diverse undergraduate background in business administration, international relations, and psychology, which has allowed me to approach data science problems from multiple angles and find innovative solutions. In my previous jobs, I have developed a strong skill set in data analysis and machine learning techniques through hands-on experience. These skills have allowed me to effectively analyse real-world datasets, identify trends and patterns, and develop data-driven solutions to complex problems.
